ns:common.topic.description: QUIKSCRIPT is a Simulation language derived from SIMSCRIPT, based on 20-GATE.
rdfs:label: QUIKSCRIPT

ns:common.document.text: QUIKSCRIPT is a Simulation language derived from SIMSCRIPT, based on 20-GATE.\n\"Quikscript - A Simscript-like Language for the G-20\", F.M. Tonge et al., Communications of the ACM 8(6):350-354 (June 1965).

ns:type.object.name: QUIKSCRIPT
